snippet: France stunned Russia, the defending world champion, at the world championships in Helsinki, Finland.
abstract: Russia, defending world champion, is upset, 2-1, by France at the world hockey championships in Helsinki, Finland.
lead_paragraph: France stunned Russia, the defending world champion, at the world championships in Helsinki, Finland.

headline.seo: France Upsets Russia in Hockey World Championships
headline.main: France Upsets Russia in Hockey World Championships
